_comment: 类型注释
drawTriggerType: 抽取触发类型(0从X次开始;1权值累加;2概率触发;3每X次;4第X次)

_comment: Item single draw - fixed probability of about 60 times of orange
Single draw of props - about 20 times, there will be an orange guarantee
Props Single Draw - Purple for the first time
Props single draw - regular output
Props 10 consecutive draws - follow-up fixed orange 6 times about ten consecutive
Props 10 draws in a row - orange will be drawn in the first draw
Props 10 consecutive draws - regular output
Conventional single draw - the weight is about 140 times red on average
Conventional single draw - about 60 times red
Conventional single draw - the average value of orange is about 50 times
Conventional single draw - about 20 times to get orange
Regular Single Draw - Purple for the first time
Regular Single Draw - Regular Output
Regular ten consecutive rounds - the follow-up weight is red - an average of 13 times
Regular ten consecutive - the first 12 red
Regular 10 consecutive rounds - red around the 4th time
Regular ten consecutive rounds - the follow-up weight is orange - an average of 4 times
Regular 10-Red for the first time
Regular ten companies - regular output
